problem_text:
In the notation of 8.82, for r(π) > 0, one can define via Hecke algebras a formal Dirichlet series with Euler multiplication (see G. Shimura, Introduction to the arithmetic theory of automorphic functions, Princeton Univ. Press, 1971). Does there exist an algebraic Hasse–Weil variety whose ζ-function is this Dirichlet series? There are several conjectures.
H. Helling
